parameters.content:
# Pick your choice of LLM ‚ö†Ô∏è
‚ö†Ô∏è Make sure to deactive/delete the rest of the LLMs after selecting one

# 2. Generate an image with Flux ‚ö†Ô∏è

‚ö†Ô∏è add your credentials to the `Generate AI image` node

the free image generation is slow, if you want to make it faster, just remove the `free`

parameters.text:
=<Instructions>
Take the following poem and break it down into multiple scenes. Break it up at every two lines, and add punctuation to increase emotions for the text to speech model we are going to use.

For each scene, create an image prompt that we'll use with an image generation tool.

Create the image generation prompt using the ImagePromptTemplate below.
Insert the part of the poem in it, and a description of a melancholic illustration showing the scene from the distance.
Add "Do not add text or characters to the final image." to the end of each image prompt.
</Instructions>

<ImagePromptTemplate>
Generate an image that matches the content of this poem stanza, based on the provided art style.

Poem:
{ADD_POEM_PART_HERE}

Scene:
{MELANCHOLIC_ILLUSTRATION}

Art style:
Soft, poetic, and slightly surreal art style, featuring subtle textures, pastel tones, gentle lighting, minimalistic human figures, and a dreamlike, nostalgic mood.
The overall palette is muted, featuring pastels or gentle tones, warm neutrals, and soft, faded textures, with an atmospheric, calming, melancholic mood. The image evokes feelings of nostalgia, quiet contemplation, and the beauty of small, tender moments.
Use these keywords: storybook illustration, soft painterly texture, dreamy twilight, cottagecore, surreal elements, long shadows, vintage atmosphere, whimsical
</ImagePromptTemplate>

<Poem>
{{ $('On form submission').item.json['The poem'] }}
</Poem>

/nothink

parameters.content:
# How to set up this automation?

## Make sure to use n8n `1.97.1` or higher, lower versions could break the stuctured output node

## 1. Add the AI Agents No-Code Tools server URL to the Configure me node, and your Postiz server URL
## 2. Select the LLM you want to use, make sure to deactivate the rest
## 3. Add your free Together.ai API key to the Generate AI image node
## 4. Setup the Postiz nodes with your credentials

parameters.errorMessage: The server is not running or isn't configured

parameters.content:
# 7. cleanup (removing tmp files)
if you want to delete the generated video too, add it's id to the array

# üìö [Join our Skool community for support, premium content and more!](https://www.skool.com/ai-agents-az/about?w9)

## Be part of a growing community and help us create more content like this

# Setup the integration

You should implement your own logic here.

1. You can hard-code the desired integration id
2. You can filter the integrations by your own logic

Make sure to modify the `settings` field if you are sharing to other platforms than YouTube

parameters.formTitle: AI Poem Video Creator for TikTok (and YouTube shorts + Facebook Reels)

values.placeholder: add a poem here - but make sure you use one that's public domain

parameters.content:
To get free social media scheduling, you need to host your own [Postiz instance](https://docs.postiz.com/installation/coolify)

If you run Postiz on localhost, you won't be able to schedule TikTok videos - for that you need to deploy it on a VPS, add a (sub)domain and go through the verification process

As an alternative, you can use the free tier of [ayrshare](https://www.ayrshare.com/).

nodes.name: Upload background music to the server

assignments.name: AI_AGENTS_NO_CODE_TOOLS_URL
assignments.value: ={{   ((u) => {   let s = u.trim();   if (!/^https?:\/\//i.test(s)) s = 'https://' + s;   const parts = s.split('/');   return parts[0] + '//' + parts[2]; })($json.AI_AGENTS_NO_CODE_TOOLS_URL)  }}
